name: Solitaire Trip
description:
An all-new exciting game of the classic Solitaire for all ages!
Easy to play, full of fun!

Begin your adventure on a picturesque journey throughout various islands, travel around the world and collect stamps!

Features:
- Easy to play, fun!
- Hundreds of exciting levels with more coming soon!
- Beautiful music and scenery, almost like you’re traveling now
- Useful items to help you on your journey
- Unlock beautiful collections across the world
- Fun and exciting story; complete them to unlock achievements

Fun and interesting game, come now and play for free!
